title: Blue needs your help
content:
Help Blue compete in the backyard fair in 123 Time Activies, and find words in ABC Time Acitivies, through various activities in these games

We recently added support for _Blue's 123 Time Activities_ and _Blue's ABC Time Activities_ and as usual you're encouraged to play through the games with a [daily build](/download/s#daily), [report](/faq/#question.report-bugs) all encountered bugs to our [bug tracker](http://bugs.scummvm.org/) and [submit some nice screenshots](http://wiki.scummvm.org/index.php/Screenshots).
author: sev
